Related repos

  • extract EXIF metadata from images, pure Python, no dependencies
  • removes metadata from images, videos, and PDFs with drag and drop
  • Scans disk images for structured information
  • File manager for the command line without a TUI
  • Picture viewer for macOS and Windows with support for AVIF and HEIC
  • Modern photo gallery with sync, EXIF display, and map features
  • extracts text from documents and images using OCR
  • Document parser for extracting content, structure, tables, and metadata from files
  • command line tool for processing CSV files
  • Open source toolset for image forensics
